statements: SELECT * FROM user_balances ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances ORDER BY user_id LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM user_balances
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT balance, user_id FROM user_balances ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 500
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id > 2 AND balance < 100
SELECT * FROM user_balances;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date, u.balance FROM transactions t JOIN user_balances u ON t.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance, MIN(balance) AS min_balance FROM user_balances;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, t.transaction_amount, u.balance FROM transactions t INNER JOIN user_balances u ON t.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, AVG(t.transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN user_balances u ON t.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE balance > 500 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT th.txn_id, t.transaction_type, th.previous_balance, th.updated_balance FROM transaction_history th LEFT JOIN transactions t ON th.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT id, name, balance FROM users;
SELECT id, timestamp, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE new_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_balances WHERE balance < 500;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT u.name, u.balance, t.amount, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.name, tb.balance FROM users u JOIN user_balances tb ON u.id = tb.user_id WHERE tb.balance < 0;
SELECT u.name, tb.balance FROM users u JOIN user_balances tb ON u.id = tb.user_id WHERE u.balance > 1000 AND tb.balance > 0 ORDER BY u.name ASC;

SELECT u.name, t.amount, l.previous_balance, l.new_balance FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.id = t.user_id JOIN transaction_log l ON t.id = l.transaction_id WHERE l.previous_balance != l.new_balance ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT user_id, type_name FROM transaction_types;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_types GROUP BY type_name;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_message, notification_date FROM user_notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
